statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE identification_document = 'Passport';
SELECT customer_id, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM identification_documents WHERE document_type='Passport';
SELECT customer_id, document_type, document_number FROM identification_documents ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN identification_documents ON customers.customer_id = identification_documents.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM identification_documents JOIN customers ON customers.customer_id = identification_documents.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM Customers JOIN Contact_Details ON Customers.customer_id = Contact_Details.customer_id WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT document_type, document_number, issued_date FROM Identification_Documents WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT Customers.first_name, Contact_Details.address, Identification_Documents.document_type FROM Customers JOIN Contact_Details ON Customers.customer_id = Contact_Details.customer_id JOIN Identification_Documents ON Customers.customer_id = Identification_Documents.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Contact_Details WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';

SELECT Customers.first_name, COUNT(Identification_Documents.document_id) AS num_documents FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Identification_Documents ON Customers.customer_id = Identification_Documents.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.first_name ORDER BY num_documents DESC;
